thread.title: Oracle adds MediaMath to subtract marketing wastage
thread.title_full: Oracle adds MediaMath to subtract marketing wastage

author: Emmanuel Garza, Chicago Online Marketing Examiner
title: Oracle adds MediaMath to subtract marketing wastage
text:
Oracle adds MediaMath to subtract marketing wastage Use your key for the next article Oracle and MediaMath: a digital marketing marriage internetsecretsmadeeasy.com 
MediaMath, a demand side platform (DSP) for digital marketing and creator of the TerminalOne Marketing Operating System, has announced the new relationship with Oracle Marketing Cloud. 
The new partnership between parties will offer enablement for B2B and B2C marketers to increase engagement by combining paid and owned media. This move will create more seamless opportunities for marketers using the Oracle Marketing Cloud to tap into the MediaMath network. 
“By working with Oracle, we are integrating powerful and complementary advertising and marketing technology to provide marketers with the complete end-to-end infrastructure they need to target their audiences at every stage of the customer journey, from awareness and engagement to purchase and retention – and beyond,” said Chris Victory, VP of Global Partnerships and Business Development at MediaMath. 
“The MediaMath app for Oracle Marketing Cloud is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to our plans for collaborating and merging the worlds of paid and owned media,” continues Victory. 
MediaMath’s TerminalOne for Oracle Marketing Cloud application, is an app within the Oracle Marketing Cloud user interface. It will enable marketers in Chicagoan businesses and beyond to extend and align digital marketing strategies across varying marketing channels. Through the Oracle technology, marketers will also be able to uncover customer habits as well for actionable insights. 
Oracle Marketing Cloud prides itself on offering clients data driven solutions through customer centric experiences that are personalized and cross-channel. Similarly, MediaMath is the global technology company with a vision to empower modern marketers in its delivery for customised audience segments.
